text: "Love Needs No Disguise" is a 1981 single by Dramatis featuring Gary Numan on vocals. It charted at number 33 on the UK Singles Chart. It got its live debut on The Warriors Tour in 1983. Of the song, Numan recalled: > "This was just the break they needed; I didn’t have anything to do with the > writing of the song and I had a great time recording the video" == Track listing == ==Charts== {|class="wikitable sortable" border="1" |- !Chart (1981) !Peak position |- |- |} ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1981 singles Category:Gary Numan songs Category:1981 songs Category:Beggars Banquet Records singles
title: Love Needs No Disguise
